category: news
title: "7 ways to reduce the learning loss caused by the pandemic"
excerpt: "School closures and the shift to online learning due to the COVID-19 pandemic have resulted in learning loss in developed and developing countries. Learning loss is generally defined as any specific or general loss of knowledge and skills or reversals in academic progress when students are not in school."
